headline: Jacobs Solutions Announces Special Dividend of 7,299,065 Shares of Amentum Common Stock
summary: Jacobs (NYSE: J) announced today that its Board of Directors approved a special dividend of 7,299,065 shares of common stock of Amentum Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: AMTM) ("Amentum") distributable to Jacobs' shareholders of record as of the close of business on May 16, 2025 (the "Amentum Share Dividend"). Jacobs expects the Amentum Share Dividend to be made on May 30, 2025. No shareholder action is necessary to receive the Amentum Share Dividend.

headline: Jacobs Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of Jacobs (NYSE:J) has declared a quarterly cash dividend payable to shareholders in the amount of $0.32 per share of Jacobs common stock. This dividend will be paid on June 20, 2025, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on May 23, 2025.
